subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Patrik Elias, a fluid and creative left wing, contracted hepatitis A while playing in Russia during the N.H.L. lockout in the 2004-5 season. He missed the Devils’ first 39 games last season.
snippet: Patrik Elias, a fluid and creative left wing, contracted hepatitis A while playing in Russia during the N.H.L. lockout in the 2004-5 season. He missed the Devils’ first 39 games last season.
